front.note:
Connect Technologies will continue to pioneer forefront technologies at the hub of a ubiquitous network.
HOME > Investment : News release

docTitle.titlePart:
Connect Technologies Corporation, Kanematsu
Communications Ltd., and Sky Media Corporation
are to conduct a CRM verification trial at DoCoMo
shops in the Kanto area. The companies plan to
develop an advertising model that makes use of
"Media Connect Station," a shop solution
compatible with NTT DoCoMo's "ToruCa(R)"
function.
